Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editorial board Medicine Healthcare and Philosophy

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Invited speaker, Jewish aspects of health and quality of life. Marburg University, Germany.
Invited speaker. Contemporary bioethical issues in Israel and "remembering the holocaust in contemporary art". University of Frankfurt, Germany.
Invited speaker. Microhypnosis. Society for Clinical Hypnosis. New Orleans, USA.
Invited speaker. Cloning: Perspectives from Judaism. University of Bochum, Germany.
Invited speaker. Human dignity: historical roots of an idea and a vision for the future. University of Padova, Italy.
Invited speaker. Human dignity beyond Kant. University of Zurich, Switzerland.
Invited speaker. Tissues banking and human rights. University of Gottingen, Germany.
Invited speaker and organiser of a study day within the conference Responsible deliberation of critical decisions in renal replacement therapy. World Congress of Nephrology, Milan, Italy.
Invited speaker. Sanctity and quality of life. Sardegna Ricerche, Cagliari, Italy.

Invited speaker. Neutrality of medical personnel in the campaigns against terrorism. International workshop, the Swiss Army, Constance, Switzerland. I was also an invited participant and academic advisor of the 2012 and 2013 workshops.
Invited speaker. Triage disaster in medicine. The Brocher Foundation, Geneva, Switzerland.
Invited speaker. Ethical problems in humanitarian medicine. Trachtenberg-Frackman Lecture, Albert Einstein College of Medicine, New York City, USA.
Invited speaker, International Conference on moral and emotional enhancement, University of Belgrade and Oxford University
Organiser, COST IS1201, Annual Conference, Ethics in Disaster Medicine. Tel Aviv University
Invited speaker. Doctor patient reltaionships and biotechnologies. Sardegna Ricerche, Cagliari, Italy.
Invited speaker. Fearful of ourselves, yearning for salvation: The moral enhancement discourse as a secular revival of Gnosticism. ERICE Summer School of Mind, Brain and Education. Erice, Italy
Invited speaker: Brainwave stimulation: a perspective from human dignity. NIH Workshop. Cold Springs Harbor Laboratories. New York, USA.
Invited speaker: Medical confidentiality, the ethics of communication and torture. International Society for the Study of Controversies. Tel Aviv University, Israel.
Invited speaker, The medical profession: Ethical and legal dilemmas”, Federico II University, Napoli

Invited speaker: Expanded Newborn Screening: Genetic Counselling at the Level of Public Health through the Prism of three Historical Case Studies. International workshop on The Establishment of Genetic Counselling in the Second Half of the 20th Century, Berlin, Germany.
Invited speaker: Medical ethics and the human body. International Workshop on Religion, Ethics and the Human body. University of Nottingham, Nottingham, UK.
Invited speaker: Ethics counselling and personalized medicine. Institut für Geschichte und Ethik der Medizin Technische Universität München (TUM)
Invited chair and organizer. Section on Medical history and ethics, the 24th World Congress of Philosophy, Beijing. China, 2018

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Founding Senior Fellow, Safra Center for Ethics, Faculty of Law, Tel Aviv University
course in military ethics, School of Political Science, Haifa University, Israel
Responsible, theoretical part, UNESCO Course for Teachers of Medical Ethics, Paris
Member of the Panel of Evaluation Experts (GEV) of the National Agency for the Evaluation of Research (ANVUR) area “Logic and Philosophy of Science”.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Brodai Prize of excellence in Palliative care, Israeli Society for Palliative Medicine
Lior Grant for biomedical research, Tel Aviv Medical Center, 2007

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Member, Hospital Ethics Committee, Meir Hospital, Israel.
Member, Board of the Israeli Society for Palliative Medicine and its Committee for drafting its code of ethics and practice guidelines.
Member, National Committee on the regulation of late abortion in Israel.
Member, Ethics Committee, EuroCancerComs, European Project.
Member, National Committee on Workers' Health, Israel.
Ethics Adviser, International Committee of Military Medicine.
Chair, Group on Research Ethics, and Steering Committee Member, COST Action IS 1201 on Ethics in Disaster Medicine
Member, Advisory Expert Committee to UNESCO and The International Organization for Judicial Training (IOJT) on Bioethics to the Judiciary.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Israeli Scientific Foundation (ISF) grant on the topic of medical professionalism (100,000 Euro)
